data.name: Global Azure Atlanta 2020
data.description: The annual Global Azure (formerly Global Azure Bootcamp) event will return to the greater metro-Atlanta area for the 6th year! The Global Azure event is a free one-day mini-conference, taking place on April 23-25 2020 in venues across the world, driven by Microsoft Azure experts and community enthus…

relatedRecords.name: Adulting.Dev
relatedRecords.description: Adulting.Dev is a one day conference for professionals developers who have recently started their careers and the managers and team leads who support them. The conference will cover topics across three themes - learning, living and leveling-up. This isn’t your typical tech conference - we’re not tal…

relatedRecords.name: Stir Trek
relatedRecords.description: Stir Trek is a one-day conference in Columbus, Ohio focused on teaching software developers the latest and greatest in technologies, techniques, and tools. The full day of content is always concluded with a private screening of a blockbuster film on its opening day.
